org.kitteh.tag

Class AsyncPlayerReceiveNameTagEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • org.kitteh.tag.AsyncPlayerReceiveNameTagEvent

  • public final class AsyncPlayerReceiveNameTagEvent
extends org.bukkit.event.Event
    Here is where the magic is made.

    This event may fire synchronously, check Event.isAsynchronous()

    Catch this event in order to have an effect on the player's name tag

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.bukkit.event.Event

      • getUUID

        public UUID getUUID()
        Gets the UUID that will be sent

        Applies to MC version 1.7 and above

        In prior versions it's a per-server UUID and not sent to the client

        Returns:
        uuid sent to the player

      • setTag

        public boolean setTag(String tag)
        Sets the nametag to be sent

        Will always set the name tag whether returning true or false.

        Nametags over 16 characters will be truncated

        Parameters:
        tag - The desired tag
        Returns:
        true if accepted as-is, false if it was truncated
